getMailbox

public org.jdesktop.dataset.DataSet getMailbox(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                                               int mailboxType,
                                               int pageNum,
                                               java.lang.String orderBy,
                                               int folderID,
                                               java.lang.String filter,
                                               int pageSize,
                                               boolean orderDesc,
                                               boolean getRetractedMsgs,
                                               boolean getInboxUnReadOnly)
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Function call that returns a XML string with various information about the mailbox folder you query

Parameters:
sessionKey - Valid string containing the user's sessionkey
mailboxType - Integer containing a (0 for inbox, 1 for outbox)
pageNum - Integer containing the page number
orderBy - String containing "DATE", "NAME", etc.
folderID - Integer containing the folder ID
filter - String to filter messages by
pageSize - Integer containing how many elements per page
orderDesc - Boolean for whether to order by description or not
getRetractedMsgs - Boolean for whether or not to get retracted messages
getInboxUnReadOnly - Boolean for whether or not to get unread only
Returns:
DataSet containing the mailbox contents
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - If the sessionKey, mailboxType, pageNum, orderBy, folderID, filer or pageSize is invalid
See Also:
Java Spec Logging On (Obtain a sessionKey), Get Folders

                                   int MID,
                                   boolean withCMHeaderXML,
                                   boolean withTrackingXML,
                                   boolean withSecurityEnvelope)
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Function call that returns a XML string with message information

Parameters:
sessionKey - Valid string containing the user's sessionkey
MID - Integer containing the Message ID (MID)
withCMHeaderXML - Boolean for whether or not to include CMHeader
withTrackingXML - Boolean for whether or not to include Tracking
withSecurityEnvelope - Boolean for whether or not to include Security Envelope
Returns:
String containing the MIME message (should be parsed with an appropriate library or javax.mail)
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - If the sessionKey or MID is invalid
See Also:
Java Spec Logging On (Obtain a sessionKey), Get Mailbox, Get Folders

                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> attachments,
                                    java.lang.String body,
                                    java.lang.String subject)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Function call that sends a message

Parameters:
sessionKey - String containing a valid sessionkey
To - String array containing all the to addresses
Cc - String array containing all the cc addresses
Bcc - String array containing all the bcc addresses
attachments - File array list containing desired attachment files
message - String containing the desired message
Subject - String containing the Subject line
Returns:
String containing the MID of the message sent
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If there were errors processing and sending the message
See Also:
Java Spec Logging On (Obtain a sessionKey)
